title: Adaptive Hierarchical Evaluation of LLMs and SAST tools for CWE Prediction in Python
summary: Large Language Models have become integral to software development, yet they frequently generate vulnerable code. Existing code vulnerability detection benchmarks employ binary classification, lacking the CWE-level specificity required for actionable feedback in iterative correction systems.
